title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and market research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Consider the following aspects: 1) Input sources (e.g., conveyor belts, drop-off points, cameras, sensors) 2) AI-powered material recognition and sorting (computer vision, machine learning models) 3) Storage and processing of sorted materials (bins, compactors, balers) 4) Integration with external systems (e.g., recycling facilities, logistics providers, inventory management) 5) Scalability and fault tolerance (load balancing, failover mechanisms, distributed architecture) 6) Security and access controls (data encryption, user authentication, role-based access) 7) Monitoring and reporting (system health, performance metrics, material tracking).

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for material recognition and classification.

title: Material Sorting Mechanism Design
description:
Design the physical sorting mechanism and its integration with the AI model. The design should consider the following aspects:

- Types of recyclable materials to be sorted (e.g., plastic, paper, metal, glass, cardboard, electronics)
- Capacity and throughput requirements (specify the expected volume and rate of material processing)
- Sorting accuracy and error handling (define acceptable error rates and procedures for handling misclassified or unsorted materials)
- Modular and scalable design for future expansion (consider modular components and standardized interfaces for easy upgrades or capacity increases)
- Maintenance and cleaning requirements (specify cleaning schedules, access points, and procedures for routine maintenance)
- Safety considerations for operators (incorporate safety features, emergency stops, and operator protection mechanisms)
- Integration with the AI model for material recognition and decision-making (define the interface and communication protocols between the sorting mechanism and the AI model)
- Data collection and monitoring for performance analysis and optimization (identify data points to be collected, storage requirements, and mechanisms for analyzing and optimizing system performance)

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for monitoring and controlling the system.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing material data, system logs, and other relevant information required for the AI-powered recycling system. The database should be scalable, efficient, and support complex queries for data analysis and reporting.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and system tests.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the system to production and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide training for system operators and maintenance personnel.
